entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 29 in the evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
